text: Eghtɨ dughiar kamɨn, iakɨnimɨn angazangarim aruemɨn angazangarimɨn mɨn siragham. Eghtɨ aruem isiragh gavgavightɨ an angazangarim bar ekevegh, a fomɨra garir angazangarim gafiragham. Mati nɨ 7plan aruebar aruer angazangariba inigha aruer vamɨra gisafura. Ikiavɨra Itir God uamategh uan gumazamiziba deravɨra me damu men mɨzaziba ko osɨmtɨziba adeghtɨ me ghuamagheghamin dughiamɨn, bizir kaba otivam.
